BBK01.SU0516: Deposit rates of banks / Time deposits with agreed maturities of 3 months, EUR 50,000 and more but less than EUR 500,000 / Lowest rate of spread

General: Up to December 2001, deposits of DM 100,000 and more but less than DM 1 million. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range.
